title: U.S. household expenditure on hair care products 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 89.95 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars about 56.1 was reached at Year 2007
